mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_contents(no_contentsno, memberno, cateno, no_title, no_contents, no_cnt,no_rdate, no_word) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no_contentsno), 0) + 1 as no_contentsno FROM notice_contents), #{memberno}, #{cateno}, #{no_title}, #{no_contents}, 0, sysdate, #{no_word})
mapper.select: SELECT no_contentsno,memberno, cateno, no_title, no_contents, no_cnt,no_rdate, no_word FROM notice_contents ORDER BY no_contentsno ASC
SELECT no_contentsno,memberno, cateno, no_title, no_contents, no_cnt,no_rdate, no_word FROM notice_contents WHERE cateno=#{cateno} ORDER BY no_contentsno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM notice_contents
SELECT no_contentsno,memberno, cateno, no_title, no_contents, no_cnt,no_rdate, no_word FROM notice_contents WHERE no_contentsno=#{no_contentsno}

SELECT no_contentsno,memberno, cateno, no_title, no_contents, no_cnt,no_rdate, no_word FROM notice_contents
WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
WHERE cateno=#{cateno} AND no_word LIKE '%' || #{no_word} || '%'
ORDER BY notice_contents DESC
